Now What?

Now that you know your total monthly payment, let's find out a bit more about your goals and we will get started right away. It only takes about 6 minutes.

Common Mortgage Questions

It is really easy to begin the mortgage process. We just need a few bits of information in order to qualify for a loan:

  • Work: Where do you work and how long have you been there?
  • income: What is your current income?
  • Debt: What are you outstanding debts?
  • Assets: Do you own a home, investment or other assets?
  • Down Payment: How much would you like to put down on a home?

Our salary-based loan consultants will clearly explain your mortgage options and answer any questions that you have. Out goal is to help you feel confident with the process and full understand your loan.

In qualifying for a loan, we have access to many loans at credit levels. Generally, the higher the score, the lower the interest rate. A typical score is above 680, but we can work with lower scores and sometimes can help boost the score with a rapid rescore process.

A prequalificaion can be completed with a submission of your financial information and preliminary underwriting review. Upon prequalificaion we will provide you with an official letter of prequalification to provide you with substantial negotiating leverage when you find the perfect home.

A preapproval takes a bit more time and full documentation. Our underwriting process will be complated provided that your new loan gets approved.

Its important to kbow what you can afford at the beginning of the mortgage process. It usually takes just a few minutes to get an idea of what you can afford and also determine the best purchase range to be in while looking for your new home.

Using our easy mortgage calculator, you'll find a good idea of a comfortable monthly payment and some specifics about loan term, downpayment, and interest rate.

A good idea is putting some amount down on a home. There is a wide range of available down payment options including First-Time Homebuyer $0 Down programs, FHA, conventional, and 100% Financed VA loans.

Most loans can be completed in less than 30 days, but if you have an urgency we can close is as fast as 10 days.

Yes. Canadian Home Financing works with a networkof experienced real estate brokers in various markets throughout the Canada. We do not receive any kickbacks or fees from our real estate partners for referrals. Our goal is to partner you with a broker who is experienced in buying and selling in the area that you live or want to move to. By referring to the best real estate professionals, we know that you will have a smooth and successfull real estate transaction from start to finish.
